greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of psi(x^3) * f(x^2, x^4) in powers of x where psi(), f() are Ramanujan theta functions.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of f(x^3) * f(-x^6) / chi(-x^2) in powers of x where chi(), f() are Ramanujan theta functions.
Expansion of q^(-11/24) * eta(q^4) * eta(q^6)^4 / (eta(q^2) * eta(q^3) * eta(q^12)) in powers of q.
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^4 + A) * eta(x^6 + A)^4 / (eta(x^2 + A) * eta(x^3 + A) * eta(x^12 + A)), n))};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Feb 21 2015
